title: Activist Corner: Jana, Elliott, Trian Make Moves
description: On "Bloomberg Deals", Scarlet Fu reports on the rise in activism this week. Investors including Jana Partners, Elliott Investment Management and Trian Fund Management made moves involving such companies as Wendy's, Tripadvisor and Norwegian Cruise. (Source: Bloomberg)
